DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Screening test use biomarkers may help doctor find tumor cell early plan effective treatment lung cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study biomarkers screen participant lung cancer .
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Identify validate biomarkers early detection lung cancer individual low- high-risk smoking-related cancer . - Identify preneoplastic cellular change lesion patient . OUTLINE : Participants stratify accord lung cancer risk status ( without increase risk ) . Group 1 ( screen cohort ) : Participants complete questionnaire undergo pulmonary function testing , multidetector chest CT scan , sputum induction , phlebotomy . Group 2 ( rule-out lung cancer ) : Participants complete questionnaire undergo test scan group 1 . Some participant may undergo fiberoptic bronchoscopy base upon CT scan result transbronchial endobronchial biopsy . Some participant may undergo lung resection . Tissue sample collect surgery biopsy . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Screening Cohort At high lowrisk lung cancer Smoking history â‰¥ 20 pack years* With without workplace exposure asbestos NOTE : * Participants < 20 pack year smoke eligible 50 year age old RuleOut Lung cancer group Referred evaluation suspicious nodule 1 follow diagnosis : Lung cancer Nonmalignant nodule ( control group ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not pregnant No prior malignancy except nonmelanoma skin cancer PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
